org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

Class TestRegionServerAbort.ErrorThrowingHRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HRegion
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestRegionServerAbort.ErrorThrowingHRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf.ConfigurationObserver, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.conf.PropagatingConfigurationObserver, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.HeapSize, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.Region
    Enclosing class:
    TestRegionServerAbort

    public static class TestRegionServerAbort.ErrorThrowingHRegion
extends org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HRegion
    Throws an exception during store file refresh in order to trigger a regionserver abort.
